name: browser-llm-script-interaction-extension
description: A browser extension that enables LLMs to interact through a chat interface

scripts.dev:chrome: echo 'Building Chrome extension in watch mode...' && TARGET=chrome vite build --mode development --watch
scripts.dev:firefox: echo 'Building Firefox extension in watch mode...' && BROWSER='/Applications/Firefox Developer Edition.app/Contents/MacOS/firefox' TARGET=firefox vite build --mode development --watch
